Title: Out Of The Blue
Plot: On November 13th 1990, in the pretty seaside township of Aramoana, David Gray took a high-powered rifle and shot dead 13 of his neighbours. Terrified residents were trapped in their homes for 22 hours, not knowing where Gray was and what he was up to, while emergency services scrambled to reach the town and a handful of local cops risked their lives trying to apprehend the gunman.
